latest_articles.title: Albania Created an ‘A.I. Minister’ to Curb Corruption. Then Its Developers Were Accused of Graft.
latest_articles.summary: The Albanian avatar known as Diella, a public anticorruption crusader, has been described as the world’s first government minister created by artificial intelligence.
latest_articles.evidence: Albania Created an ‘A.I. Minister’ to Curb Corruption
